DSS Times From POSIXct

Source: R/write.r
dss_times_from_posix.Rd

Convert POSIXct timestamps to DSS times.

Usage

dss_times_from_posix(datetimes, dss_interval)

Arguments

datetimes

A POSIXct vector. Default is 60L (one minute).

dss_interval

The DSS time interval, e.g., "15MIN", "1DAY", "IR-CENTURY", etc.

Value

A named list for writing to DSS.

On this page

Developed by Michael Koohafkan, Evan Heisman, Cameron Bracken.
